Blog.post: My goodness, finally one of the NBA teams I was routing for won the game! Pistons beat the Nets tonight, I am a happy camper... Mavs and Spurs are both out, Pisotns all the way BABY!!! Going to game 7 this Thursday with my brother, should be another blast, I will try to convince him to wear the Afro too... Haha... Talk to her today... Things are weird, a lot of ups and downs, now we are in the ups again, if it goes down again, don't think I can take this anymore. At times, I feel it's slowing me down. There's so many things I want to accomplish in life, but she is starting to fade out from the picture. I still love her, but I really see a future... Sigh, weekend is gone already, other week of work... /_\

Man, that was a good movie... So far, these summer blockbusters are awesome! I am loving it, there are more to come, I can't wait.... See, I am not very picky about movies, I saw a few since the beginning of May, I gotta say they are all very good. Let's see what's next - The Day After Tomorrow... Not expecting a lot, but should be a pretty good flick... Time to crap out, me tired...

Man, what a heart breaking lost for the Spurs. Timmy with a awesome shot with 0.4s left, but just couldn't hold on... The clock started late, I still think the Lakers got lucky, hopefully they will win the next two. Man, I have never seen my brother so depressed, only time can tell if his team will make a come back. Yeah, my team Dallas is already out, Detroit should be able to pull it off tonight... Yay, weekend is here, me going home...

Wow, my first ever post anywhere online, but not a newb at this online business, this is kinda cool, I think I will start doing this more often. Some things in life are frustrating right now, but I am trying to maintain a positive attitude, who isn't right? Well, I am doing pretty good, pretty proud of myself... Although it's only been two days, I am kicking ass! Haha, eat (kinda) right and working out... Gotta lose weight, gotta lose weight. Can't wait to begin summer!
Man, two ugly games, come on now... Gotta pull it together, hope Big Ben and Billups are all right...

Can't wait 'til this weekend, going down to Louisville to see my bro... The drive is gonna suck, but it's been months since I saw him... Should be good times... Conoeing (sp?) should be interesting... Feel bad not doing the project this weekend tho... Well, not that bad... Hee hee... Freakin sore man, gotta get some sleep... Later dudes! Thank you, come again! - Kumar

Just found out this morning, that second half starts TODAY!!! It'd be nice to have at least a day notice... Did nooot happen... Oh well, sh!t happens, right? Lost all 3 games today... Well, we've got plenty of time to turn this baby around... Something is missing... Need more laughter... I really need a vacation, soon... 想回家...
WTF man? I need to play ball to release stress... Take your camp back to your school... Dang it... Maybe tomorrow... Freakin tired man... All right, I am out... 91

Boring... Boooring... Boooooring... Cooked some Kimchi flavored noodles... Mmmm, good... But didn't settle too well in my tummy tho... Hehe... We'll stop there... Tired of waiting around man... Time to explore... Uhh... Where ne? Need to play some ball, get some stress out... See you on Friday...

Anybody wants to go to Shanty Creek with me? Damn, it's a free trip man... Man, only if I thought of it earlier... Oh well... My brother is the sh!t man, I am so happy he got to stay! Gonna see him in less than two weeks... Bringing down my sneaka's & my rock... And I don't mind taking UL ppl to school... Yeah... BB, hang in there... I wish I could be there and ride it out with you...

OHHH YEAH!!! 25-11, still don't know who won the league tho, soon, I hope. Last season we ended little under 500... I am proud of my team man, I glad they are there... Got a new teammate for the 2nd half to complete the foursome... Let's Get It ON!!! I know the times is tough right now, hope you maintain the right mind set... I am going to give it two more weeks, and see if things get better... My patience is running low...

So happy, my dad is all good, no biggie... Before you know it, it was all gone... Anyway, weekend was full of... SLEEP!!! Nothing wrong with that tho, time for recharge man... Now I am GTG! Did you know you can buy yakitori at Sam's club? M-Mmm good... Might be a little expensive tho... What's up with all the kids? Not yet man, where's all the single people at? I, Robot... Sh!t was SWEEEEEET, oh man... I like... Must see, guys!

It's weird how things are at work... You are busy You are not You are busy You are not... Sigh... Oh well, enough about that... Company summer party tomorrow. Should be fun... Still gotta pcik up something to pass around.... Cheesecake! Cheescake! Sounds good, eh? Watched Out of Time, nicely done, always love movie with a lot of twists... Talk about twists - The Life of David Gale was a good movie... So many old movies I still need to see again...

One more day until the weekend baby!!! Yeah... Thank I will try to setup raquetball this weekend, haven't done that for while... Getting lazy man, gotta work out... Must... Get... In... Shape... Buying a house is tough man, need to have... $ Did you see the car in I, Robot looks SWEET. Audi RSQ Concept...
Work should never be this way... More challenge please, losing interest here... Can't wait 'til that day, I will somewhere else... I want some authentic Taiwanese food!
Dad is not doing well, hope he will recover soon... Have a safe trip mom, get well too...

Man, I sucked at VBall today, couldn't do nothing right, work is getting to my head, maybe? Haha... NBA is over, I need more basketball... Oh oh, first off, Pistons BABY!!! Running chick is a go... Go get her man... I am confused, not too sure what I want anymore... Life is short...
It's been a while, but I am back... 睡...
Ten hrs of OT already, and it's only Wednesday... Shuei... I am gonna pass out... 91

Big bro is doing good, living happily, me happy for him too... Drive sucked, I went a little faster then I should have, hee hee... Just wanted to get home... Another deadline, gonna be working a lot of OTs... Gotta start studying soon again... Another 3 months of hell... Gotta pass... BB is doing better... Hope I can see you soon... Things are falling apart here...
